casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scott David ALLEN. No. 115A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 6, 2005. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Scott David Allen. William N. Farrell, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of June 2005 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 10th day of July 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of June 2005."
